alert.note: Alert for Burnet (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 12:18PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Burnet County through 100 PM CDT... At 1217 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Watson, or 9 miles southeast of Lampasas, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Victor, Mahomet, Sunnylane, Joppa, Watson, Briggs and Shady Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for south central Texas.
